message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.
Thank you for your offer Alice.  $18,000 is a bit too high for my budget.  I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product.  This is a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $13,500 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16,000. This price is still a good deal for both of us, considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $16,000 is still higher than what I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $14,500. This is a fair price that allows us both to benefit from this deal.

Bob, I understand that you're willing to go up to $14,500, but I'm not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $15,200. This is a fair price that still reflects the value the product brings to your business.
